description:
Audience Level: Beginners, Pythonistas who build on FastAPI who are not security experts but still need to deploy secure APIs.

Is implementing authorization to your API endpoints an afterthought? Who should have access to your API endpoints? This talk covers using OAuth 2.0 to secure API endpoints (including ML endpoints) built on FastAPI following industry-recognized best practices. Come on a journey with me from taking your API endpoints to being not just functional but also secure. When you follow secure identity standards, youâ€™ll be equipped with a deeper understanding of the critical need for authorization.
title: Safeguard your precious API endpoints built on FastAPI using OAuth 2.0
